entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:29 a.m. MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -2.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 9:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of snow this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:29 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:29 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
